name: Still Fishing
description:
Made over the course of a weekend for Lost Cartridge Game Jam 2022 by The Average Friendship Enjoyers

Controls: The game only has one button, which is mapped to either the A key or mouse clicks.

Art by Snacka
Music by Chipswoon
Programming by TwelveSharks & Bayin

Narrative by Snacka, Chipswoon, TwelveSharks & Bayin

With assets from: https://franktheape.itch.io/pixel-button-prompt

Font: https://mounirtohami.itch.io/minimalpixel-font
